description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的政权之一，位于现广东、广西、海南、香港、澳门以及越南北部，后于971年被北宋所灭。
description.en: One of the states during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, located in modern-day Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Hong Kong, Macau, and northern Vietnam. It was conquered by the Northern Song dynasty in 971.

description.zh-cn: 南汉开国皇帝，史称南汉高祖。于917年在番禺称帝，建立“大越”，次年改国号为“大汉”。
description.en: The founding emperor of Southern Han, known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Southern Han. He proclaimed himself emperor in Panyu in 917, establishing the state of 'Great Yue', which he renamed 'Great Han' the following year.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上承五代十国、下启元朝的朝代。971年，宋朝军队攻灭南汉。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that succeeded the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period and preceded the Yuan dynasty. In 971, the Song army conquered the Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝末年封州刺史，为南汉的建立奠定了基础。其子刘隐、刘䶮相继继承其势力。
description.en: The prefect of Feng Prefecture in the late Tang dynasty who laid the foundation for the Southern Han state. His sons Liu Yin and Liu Yan succeeded his power.

description.zh-cn: 唐末五代十国时期清海军节度使，南汉建立者刘䶮之兄，为南汉的建立奠定基础。
description.en: Military governor (Jiedushi) of the Qinghaijun Circuit during the late Tang and Five Dynasties period. He was the elder brother of Liu Yan, the founder of Southern Han, and laid the groundwork for the state's establishment.

description.zh-cn: 南汉第二位皇帝，史称殇帝，继承其父刘䶮的皇位，后被其弟刘晟所杀。
description.en: The second emperor of Southern Han, known posthumously as Emperor Shang. He succeeded his father Liu Yan and was later killed by his younger brother Liu Sheng.

description.zh-cn: 南汉第三位皇帝，史称中宗。他杀害其兄刘玢后自立为帝。
description.en: The third emperor of Southern Han, known posthumously as Emperor Zhongzong. He ascended to the throne after killing his elder brother Liu Bin.

description.zh-cn: 南汉末代皇帝，史称后主。
description.en: The last emperor of Southern Han, known as the 'Last Ruler' (Houzhu).

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的五代第一个朝代。
description.en: The first of the Five Dynasties during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 越南吴朝的开创者。他于937年击败南汉军队，在交州建立吴朝。
description.en: Founder of the Ngô dynasty in Vietnam. He defeated the Southern Han army in 937 and established his dynasty in Jiaozhou.

description.zh-cn: 由吴权在击败南汉军队后建立的越南王朝。
description.en: A Vietnamese dynasty established by Ngô Quyền after defeating the Southern Han army.

description.zh-cn: 南汉高祖刘䶮之子，被封为交王，在领兵进攻吴权时兵败阵亡。
description.en: Son of Emperor Gaozu of Southern Han, Liu Yan. He was titled Prince of Jiao and was killed in battle while leading an army against Ngô Quyền.

description.zh-cn: 南汉交州属将，在杀死主管官员后向南汉求救以对抗吴权。
description.en: A general in Jiaozhou under Southern Han. After killing the chief official, he requested aid from Southern Han to fight against Ngô Quyền.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一，位于今湖南地区。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, located in modern-day Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一，曾与南汉为友好邻邦。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, once a friendly neighboring state to Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝开国皇帝，史称宋太祖。他下令征讨南汉。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Song dynasty, known as Emperor Taizu of Song. He ordered the conquest of Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 北宋开国名将，被赵匡胤任命为都总管，率军攻灭南汉。
description.en: A founding general of the Northern Song dynasty. He was appointed by Zhao Kuangyin as the commander-in-chief to lead the army that conquered Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 南唐末代君主。曾受宋太祖之命劝说南汉归降。
description.en: The last ruler of the Southern Tang. He was instructed by Emperor Taizu of Song to persuade Southern Han to submit.

description.zh-cn: 南汉将领。成功抵御宋军后，遭诬陷谋反并被后主刘𬬮赐死。
description.en: A general of Southern Han. After successfully repelling the Song army, he was falsely accused of treason and put to death by the Last Ruler Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 南汉将领，在宋军进攻时见南汉大势已去，遂投降宋朝。
description.en: A general of Southern Han who surrendered to the Song army during their invasion, seeing that the Southern Han was doomed.

description.zh-cn: 北宋为统一中国而进行的一系列战争，其中包括消灭南汉的战役。
description.en: A series of wars waged by the Northern Song to unify China, which included the campaign to conquer Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 南汉在北宋开国战争中被宋军攻灭。
description.en: The Southern Han was conquered by the Song army during the wars of the founding of the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 刘䶮于917年在番禺称帝，国号“大越”，次年改国号为“大汉”，史称南汉。
description.en: In 917, Liu Yan proclaimed himself emperor in Panyu, establishing the state of 'Great Yue', which he renamed 'Great Han' the following year, known to history as Southern Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘隐接受后梁的册封，先后被封为彭郡王、南平王、南海王，名义上是后梁的臣属。
description.en: Liu Yin accepted titles from the Later Liang, being successively created Prince of Peng Commandery, Prince of Nanping, and Prince of Nanhai, nominally a vassal of the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 刘晟（原名刘弘熙）杀害其兄刘玢（原名刘弘度）后自立为帝。
description.en: Liu Sheng (original name Liu Hongxi) killed his elder brother Liu Bin (original name Liu Hongdu) and declared himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 吴权击败南汉军队，占有交州，使该地区脱离南汉控制。
description.en: Ngô Quyền defeated the Southern Han army and occupied Jiaozhou, removing the region from Southern Han's control.

description.zh-cn: 吴权在交州打败了刘䶮之子刘弘操率领的南汉军队，刘弘操在此战中阵亡。
description.en: In Jiaozhou, Ngô Quyền defeated the Southern Han army led by Liu Hongcao, son of Liu Yan; Liu Hongcao was killed in this battle.

description.zh-cn: 吴权在击败南汉军队后占有交州，建立了吴朝。
description.en: After defeating the Southern Han army, Ngô Quyền occupied Jiaozhou and founded the Ngô dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 矫公羡在交州兵变后，向南汉君主刘䶮求救，促使刘䶮派兵干预。
description.en: After a mutiny in Jiaozhou, Kiều Công Tiễn requested aid from the Southern Han ruler Liu Yan, prompting Liu Yan to send troops to intervene.

description.zh-cn: 公元951年，刘晟乘马楚内乱之际，夺取了原属马楚的岭南之地。
description.en: In 951, Liu Sheng took advantage of internal turmoil in the state of Chu to seize its territories in the Lingnan region.

description.zh-cn: 南汉与南唐曾经是友好邻邦，两国关系被形容为“情若弟兄，义同交契”。
description.en: Southern Han and Southern Tang were once friendly neighboring states, with their relationship described as being 'like brothers in affection, and united by a common bond'.

description.zh-cn: 邵廷琄成功抵御宋军后，反遭诬陷谋反，被后主刘𬬮赐死。
description.en: After successfully repelling the Song army, Shao Tingyuan was falsely accused of treason and put to death by the Last Ruler Liu Chang.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤授意南唐国主李煜，劝说南汉后主刘𬬮主动归降宋朝。
description.en: Emperor Taizu of Song, Zhao Kuangyin, instructed Li Yu, the ruler of Southern Tang, to persuade Liu Chang, the Last Ruler of Southern Han, to voluntarily submit to the Song.

description.zh-cn: 李煜受宋太祖之命，派使者游说刘𬬮向宋称臣。
description.en: Under the instruction of Emperor Taizu of Song, Li Yu sent an envoy to persuade Liu Chang to become a vassal of the Song.

description.zh-cn: 刘𬬮拒绝了李煜的劝降，扣押了南唐使者并回书斥责李煜。
description.en: Liu Chang rejected Li Yu's persuasion to surrender, detained the Southern Tang envoy, and sent back a letter rebuking Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 南汉将领潘崇彻见南汉覆灭在即，向宋军投降，加速了南汉的灭亡。
description.en: The Southern Han general Pan Chongche, seeing the imminent collapse of the state, surrendered to the Song army, hastening Southern Han's demise.

position.zh-cn: 贺州道行营兵马都总管
position.en: Commander-in-Chief of the Hezhou Circuit Field Army

description.zh-cn: 赵匡胤任命潘美为都总管，发兵攻打南汉。
description.en: Zhao Kuangyin appointed Pan Mei as Commander-in-Chief and dispatched him to attack Southern Han.
